NodeClient

Class: Cache

Cache

Handling for the in-memory and filesystem cache. Primary use cases are for large filsystem reads and for rscandir.

new Cache(key, val, options)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
key String
val *
options Object

Members

inMemory :Boolean

If true, only stored in memory (never written to disk).
Type:
  • Boolean

key

The key.

lastModified :Date

This is the time the cache was last updated with a value.
Type:
  • Date

persist :Boolean

If true, stores to disk before the process exits. Else erases.
Type:
  • Boolean

prefix :String

If provided, is the file prefix when saving the cache. Can be mix of directory and filename.
Type:
  • String

startTime :Date

This is the time the cache was created.
Type:
  • Date

value :*

This is the value of the cache.
Type:
  • *

Methods

<static> clear(andRemoveFiles)

Clears the cache from memory and optionally the filesystem.
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
andRemoveFiles Boolean false If true, removes cache files from the filesystem as well.

<static> file(key)

Gets the cache file for a key.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
key String The key to retrieve file for.

<static> get(key)

Reads a set of files from the cache.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
key String The key to look for.
Returns:
The value stored in the cache key if it exists. Otherwise, null is returned.
Type
*

<static> getObject(key)

Reads a set of files from the cache.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
key String The key to look for.
Returns:
The value stored in the cache key if it exists. Otherwise, null is returned.
Type
*

<static> has(key)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
key String The key to lookup.
Returns:
True if the key exists.
Type
Boolean

<static> invalidate()

Invalidates the cache,

<static> onSave()

Allow the addition of a callback such that callback is called with the key being saved and the value.

<static> onShutdown()

When the system shuts down, all cache files shall be re-saved to the filesystem.

<static> options(key, obj)

Sets the options of the key.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
key String The key to lookup.
obj Object The options for this cache.

<static> read(key)

Reads the cache from the filesystem.
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
key String null The key to read.
Returns:
The result of calling a get on the key.
Type
*

<static> remove()

Removes from filesystem if exists.

<static> save(filterKey, removeFromMemory)

Saves the current cache to the filesystem.
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
filterKey String null (Optional) The key to save. If provided, only the filterKey is saved.
removeFromMemory Boolean false If true, removes the cache from memory.

<static> set(key, val, options)

Sets a key within the cache file.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
key String The key to set.
val * The value.
options Object (Optional) Options for the cache. If provided, sets the options for the object.
